title: BioDataWorks
subtitle: Freelance Consultant — AI & Machine Learning for Life Sciences
description: Providing short-term consulting and technical implementation for academic labs and biotech startups. Services include AI agents for literature review, RAG-powered lab notebook search, workflow automation, and image-based machine learning analysis.

title: Earle A. Chiles Research Institute
subtitle: Bioinformatics Scientist
description: Developing machine learning models to make predictions from high-resolution biopsy slide images and genomic sequencing data. Building open-source methods for analyzing highly multiplexed immunofluorescence images to characterize the tumor microenvironment.

title: Earle A. Chiles Research Institute
subtitle: Bioinformatics Intern
description: Developed machine learning models from histopathology images to detect tumor regions and predict breast cancer stage. Created reusable codebases and strategies for ML dataset preparation and preprocessing in the Piening Lab.

title: University of Oregon
subtitle: Master’s Degree, Biology (Bioinformatics & Genomics)
description: Knight Campus Graduate Internship Program: Bioinformatics & Genomics track

title: University of Idaho
subtitle: Research Technician
description: Studied virus-host interactions in mammalian and yeast models in the Rowley Lab. Managed daily lab operations, including ordering, budgeting, maintaining equipment, and organizing records.

title: Washington State University
subtitle: Microbiologist
description: Worked in the Molecular Diagnostics division of WADDL, extracting genetic material from diverse animal specimens and testing for pathogens using PCR.

title: Anatek Labs, Inc.
subtitle: Chemist
description: Performed coliform testing, ultra-trace mercury (CVAFS), trace metals (ICP-OES), and ammonia/TKN analysis (FIA).
